item.title: Predicting Kobe Bryant Shot Selection
item.description: Kobe Bryant was a prolific American professional basketball player, and is considered one of the greatest players in the history of the game. We are provided with the location and circumstances of every shot attempted by Bryant during his 20-year career. The goal of the project is twofold: 1st - Model the data to predict whether the shot was made successfully or not on the test dataset, given the model data set.
